DOC.brief_summary: Medically inoperable lung cancer metastatic lung tumour treat fractionated stereotactic radiation use schedule 1 ) 12 Gy x 4 treatment 2 ) 6 Gy x 10 treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Phase I/II Study Fractionated Stereotactic Radiotherapy Medically Inoperable Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer ( NSCLC ) Metastatic Lung Tumours
DOC.criteria: nonsmall cell lung cancer le 6cm ; mediastinal distant metastasis Open Alberta , Canada Residents tumour size great 6cm ; inadequate pulmonary function ( ie . FEV1 le 0.8 L ) , Karnofsky performance status less 70 , multiple comorbid condition
